General.Name: Eurospan Holdings Bhd
General.Description: Eurospan Holdings Berhad, an investment holding company, manufactures and trades in furniture and wood-based products in Malaysia. It offers ready-to-assemble and assembled furniture products, such as dining tables, dining chairs, cabinets, dining sets, and benches; and management services. The company also exports its products to Europe, the United Kingdom, the United States, the Asia Pacific, Canada, Central and South America, Australia, Africa, Japan, Singapore, Russia, Oceania, New Zealand, Korea, Hong Kong, Taiwan, and the Middle East. Eurospan Holdings Berhad was founded in 1972 and is based in Butterworth, Malaysia.
